nodes.id: 中央国家安全委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central National Security Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会的办事机构，是中共中央办事机构，行政级别为正部级。
description.en: The working body of the Central National Security Commission, it is a working body of the CCP Central Committee with a ministerial-level administrative rank.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记、中央办公厅主任、中央国家安全委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, and Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会下属的机构，负责协调和领导国家安全事务。
description.en: An agency under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, responsible for coordinating and leading national security affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会直属机构

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属机构
en: Institutions directly under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党中央委员会直接领导和管理的机构类别。
description.en: A category of institutions directly led and managed by the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央国家安全工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央国家安全工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会的前身机构之一，2000年9月由中共中央决定组建。
description.en: One of the predecessor bodies to the Central National Security Commission, established by the CCP Central Committee in September 2000.

zh-cn: 中央外事工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党和国家外事工作的决策和议事协调机构。
description.en: The decision-making, deliberative, and coordinating body for the foreign affairs work of the Chinese Communist Party and the state.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第三代最高领导人，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The third-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任国务院副总理、外交部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中央外事工作领导小组办公室和中央国家安全工作领导小组办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, former Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Leading Group and the Office of the Central National Security Leading Group.

nodes.id: 中央外事工作领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 中央外事工作领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 中央外事工作领导小组的办事机构。
description.en: The working body of the Central Foreign Affairs Leading Group.

nodes.id: 中央国家安全工作领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 中央国家安全工作领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全工作领导小组的办事机构，2014年更名为中央国家安全委员会办公室。
description.en: The working body of the Central National Security Leading Group, renamed the Office of the Central National Security Commission in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长、中央办公厅主任、中央国家安全委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, and Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理，曾任中央办公厅主任、中央国家安全委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, formerly served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee and Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中央国家安全委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently Deputy Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央政法委书记，曾任中央国安办常务副主任、国家安全部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, formerly served as Executive Deputy Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission and Minister of State Security.

nodes.id: 中央国家安全委员会办公室综合局

zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室综合局

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室的内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央国家安全委员会办公室机关委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央国家安全委员会办公室机关委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室的内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party.

en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The working body of the Political Bureau of the CCP Central Committee and its Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 为中共中央、中央直属机关服务的办事机关。
description.en: The administrative body that serves the CCP Central Committee and its directly affiliated organs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部
en: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国家安全工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for state security.

relationships.source: 中央国家安全委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中央国家安全委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室是中央国家安全委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central National Security Commission is the working body of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.source: 中央国家安全委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室是中共中央办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central National Security Commission is a working body of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中央国家安全委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会直属机构

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全委员会办公室是中共中央直属机构中的办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central National Security Commission is a working body among the institutions directly under the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中央国家安全工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 2000年9月，中共中央决定组建“中央国家安全工作领导小组”。
description.en: In September 2000, the CCP Central Committee decided to form the 'Central National Security Leading Group'.

relationships.target: 中央国家安全工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 2014年中央国家安全委员会成立后，中央外事工作领导小组不再保留“中央国家安全工作领导小组”的名义，该小组随之被取代。
description.en: After the establishment of the Central National Security Commission in 2014, the Central Foreign Affairs Leading Group no longer retained the name 'Central National Security Leading Group', and the group was subsequently replaced.

relationships.source: 中央国家安全工作领导小组办公室
relationships.target: 中央国家安全委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 2014年，中央国家安全工作领导小组办公室更名为中央国家安全委员会办公室。
description.en: In 2014, the Office of the Central National Security Leading Group was renamed the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.source: 中央国家安全工作领导小组
relationships.target: 中央外事工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央国家安全工作领导小组与中央外事工作领导小组合署办公，一个机构两块牌子。
description.en: The Central National Security Leading Group and the Central Foreign Affairs Leading Group were co-located under the model of 'one institution with two names'.

relationships.target: 中央国家安全委员会办公室
中央国家安全委员会办公室
中央国家安全委员会办公室
中央国家安全委员会办公室

position.zh-cn: 副主任、主持常务工作的副主任
position.en: Deputy Director, Deputy Director in charge of daily work

description.zh-cn: 2014年3月至2015年4月任副主任，2015年4月至2016年10月任主持常务工作的副主任（正部长级）。
description.en: Served as Deputy Director from March 2014 to April 2015, and as Deputy Director in charge of daily work (ministerial level) from April 2015 to October 2016.

relationships.target: 中央国家安全委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 2022年7月起分管日常工作（正部长级）。
description.en: Has been in charge of daily work (ministerial level) since July 2022.

description.zh-cn: 综合局是中央国安办的内设机构。
description.en: The General Affairs Bureau is an internal department of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

description.en: The Party Committee is an internal department of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央书记处
中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
中共中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办主任期间兼任中共中央书记处书记。
description.en: Concurrently served as a secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat while serving as Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办主任期间兼任中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Concurrently served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee while serving as Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.target: 中共中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办主任期间兼任中共中央书记处书记。
description.en: Concurrently served as a secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat while serving as Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办主任期间兼任中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Concurrently served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee while serving as Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央国安办常务副主任期间兼任国家安全部部长。
description.en: Concurrently served as Minister of State Security while serving as Executive Deputy Director of the Office of the Central National Security Commission.
